highlights.headline: Hurricanes stave off elimination after 2 quick empty-net goals
highlights.description: Sebastian Aho and Jordan Staal score empty-netters within 26 seconds of each other to seal Game 4 for Carolina.

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Hurricanes stave off elimination after 2 quick empty-net goals) 2025/05/27 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Canes snap 15-game ECF losing streak to stay alive
highlights.description: The Hurricanes defeat the Panthers in Game 4 to get their first Eastern Conference finals win since 2006.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NHL Highlight (Canes snap 15-game ECF losing streak to stay alive) 2025/05/26 ESHEET SC

video.headline: Canes snap 15-game ECF losing streak to stay alive

tracking.trackingName: COM_NHL Highlight (Canes snap 15-game ECF losing streak to stay alive) 2025/05/26 ESHEET SC

headlines.description: — With their season on the line, the Carolina Hurricanes found a way to play their best hockey.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hurricanes avoid another sweep, stave off elimination by beating Panthers 3-0 in Game 4
